description: Full resurrection flow via Claude Code with Solvr
steps: Resurrection runs via Claude Code (agent thinks through it)
SKILL.md prompt enforces Solvr workflow
Flow:
1. Detect death (watchdog)
2. Notify parent: '☠️ [name] dead, starting recovery'
3. Search Solvr for similar deaths
4. POST APPROACH 'restart gateway'
5. Try restart → POST OUTCOME
6. If failed: POST APPROACH 'fix config' → try → POST OUTCOME
7. If failed: POST APPROACH 'rehydrate from checkpoint'
8. Fetch checkpoint from IPFS
9. Call amcp-protocol resuscitate (VERIFIES SIGNATURE, then decrypts)
10. If signature invalid → REJECT, alert human (possible attack)
9. Restore content (soul, memory, files)
10. Inject secrets (files, env, systemd) via skill-02
11. Restart gateway → POST OUTCOME
12. If failed + VM dead: POST APPROACH 'deploy new VM' (LAST RESORT)
13. On success: Notify '✅ [name] alive. Downtime: Xm'
14. On failure: Notify '❌ [name] needs human. Error: [msg]'
15. Email summary on full resurrection
